General.Name: Hil Industries Bhd
General.Description: Hil Industries Berhad, an investment holding company, manufactures and sells industrial and domestic molded plastic products in Malaysia and the People's Republic of China. It operates through Manufacturing; Property Development and Management; and Trading, Services and Others segments. The company offers various services, including design and development, mold and dies fabrication, injection molding, in mold decoration, spray painting, silk screen and tempo printing, hi-frequency and vibration welding, direct digital printing, surface decoration, assembly, blow molding, weld lineless and high gloss injection molding, headlining and die-cutting, and quality control assurance. It is also involved in the development of residential, commercial, and light and management industrial properties; letting out properties; and provision of property management, including cleaning services. In addition, the company develops and manufactures headlining for the automotive industry; researches, designs, manufactures, and sells various precision molds and relevant plastic products, as well as provides related services; and offers sub-assembly of plastic-related products. Further, it is involved in the general trading; property investment and holding; mould making and precision metal stamping; and housing development activities. The company was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Shah Alam, Malaysia. Hil Industries Berhad is a subsidiary of Dalta Industries Sdn Bhd.
